titleStmt.title: The actions of the Lowe Countries. Written by Sr. Roger Williams Knight
titleStmt.author: Williams, Roger, Sir, 1540?-1595.
Hayward, John, Sir, 1564?-1627.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Humfrey Lownes, for Mathew Lownes,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "[fleuron]"; the last leaf is blank.
C4 is a cancel in some copies.
Identified as STC 25731a on UMI microfilm reel 602.
Reproductions of the originals in the Folger Shakespeare Library and the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Appears at reel 602 (Folger Shakespeare Library copy) and at reel 1401 (Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery copy).
